item.title: Vulnversity
item.description: Learn about active recon, web app attacks and privilege escalation.

item.title: Blue
item.description: Deploy & hack into a Windows machine, leveraging common misconfigurations issues.

item.title: Kenobi
item.description: Walkthrough on exploiting a Linux machine. Enumerate Samba for shares, manipulate a vulnerable version of proftpd and escalate your privileges with path variable manipulation.

item.title: Steel Mountain
item.description: Hack into a Mr. Robot themed Windows machine. Use metasploit for initial access, utilise powershell for Windows privilege escalation enumeration and learn a new technique to get Administrator access.

item.title: Alfred
item.description: Exploit Jenkins to gain an initial shell, then escalate your privileges by exploiting Windows authentication tokens.

item.title: Hack Park
item.description: Bruteforce a websites login with Hydra, identify and use a public exploit then escalate your privileges on this Windows machine!

item.title: Daily Bugle
item.description: Compromise a Joomla CMS account via SQLi, practise cracking hashes and escalate your privileges by taking advantage of yum.
